entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update projects to build net7.0 TFM #62510
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: 'end' must not be less than 'start' in CSharpStructureHelpers.cs:286 #62506
  • Localization misinterpretation #62504
  • Missing "The variable is assigned but its value is never used" for tuple declarations #62499
    17.4
  • Error List not showing suppressed diagnostics #62498
  • [LSP] Diagnostics do not refresh on option change #62495

Closed

  • Spelling error: `dircetory` #62507
  • Diagnostic reported for `scoped` modifier on non-ref struct type should be a warning only #62318
    17.4
  • Redundant recompilation of source code due to file path case sensitivity. #62097
    17.4
  • Clicking on link in source code opens incorrect URL #62503
  • Remove redundant parentheses isn't reported for single-parameterized lambda #61882
  • IDisposable analyzer #61850
  • An instance of analyzer Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MakeFieldReadonly.MakeFieldReadonlyDiagnosticAnalyzer cannot be created starting version 6.0.300 #61783
  • Records with framework multi-targeting throw System.TypeLoadException #61457
  • Specifying `file` class as generic constraints crashes the compiler with NRE #62435
    17.4
  • Are `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Location` instances safe to cache in Incremental Source Generators? #62269
  • CS8619 is reported on anonymous types #62500
  • Stackoverflow with u8 literal concatenation on macOS #62361
    17.4
  • Eliminate use of ParsingTests.UsingTree("...", verifyErrors: false) #61586
    Compiler.Next
  • [LSP] Support diagnostics requests for projection scenarios #58778
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Use "file local types" instead of "file types" #62514
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix null reference in DiagnosticIncrementalAnalyzer.CompilationManager #62513
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add a GH issue template for localization suggestions. #62512
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Node Selection Incomplete member and Global Statement fix #62509
    Bug, Area-IDE
  • Record completion of file-types #62505
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Don't report diagnostics if code-style option is disabled #62497
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add LanguageVersion.CSharp11 #62496
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix typo #62511
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62492
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62494
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62493
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add tests showing the limitations of file-local type shadowing #62489
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Remove line that does nothing #62508
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Next
  • Export embedded language detector through EA layer for asp.net #62502
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change the data-flow path for searching for attributes to prevent fewer intermediary tables. #62389
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Suggested simplifications to the incremental generator codebase. #62427
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix crash with type parameter on type constrained to file-local type #62448
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add link to detailed map of VS and SDK versions #62438
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Resolve overflow with deeply nested UTF-8 concatenation #62469
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Verify diagnostics in parsing tests #62341
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Remove expensive and unneeded syntax tree verification #62382
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62517
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62516
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62515
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionCleared #62257
    Area-IDE
  • Enable nullable for classes under Rename folder #62453
    Area-IDE
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Immediately filter syntax trees down to those that either have attributes or global-using-aliases. #62483
    Area-Compilers
  • Give a specific message when analyzer references a more-recent compiler version #61261
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Add array initialization optimization #62392
    Area-Compilers
  • Track used local constants in attributes #62158
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use secondary buffer in contained language file paths #62488
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Increase timeout for unix single machine job #62393
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run EndToEnd tests in a more isolated/controlled environment #62433
    Area-Compilers
  • Use BackgroundWorkIndicator for FormatSelection #61910
    Area-IDE
  • Make sure options in Tools → Options are persisted #62357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Handle diff3 conflict markers #62391
    Area-Compilers
  • Update integration CI job names #55083
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Fix post init trees parsing when parse options change #61934
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • EnC: Handle partially loaded projects #62454
    Area-Interactive
  • Add prefer trailing commas code-style option #54859
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll in Solution support for Enable nullable refactoring #61879
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers
  • Find the right symbol when following type forwards #62406
    Area-IDE
  • Features/editorconfig lsp #62484
    Area-Compilers, Community
